column4: medze ndaase mebɛma wo; na kaansa wo bo fuuw me a
na munnkosuro: EWURADZE nye m’ahoɔdzen na mo ndwom: ɔno na ɔabɛyɛ mo nkwagye."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi enyigye na hom dze bɔtow nsu efi nkwagye bura no mu."

column5: hom mbɔ ne nyɛe dawur nkyerɛ aman
column6: hom mpaa mu nka dɛ wɔama ne dzin do."

column2: "Hom ntow ndwom mma EWURADZE; na ɔayɛ enyimnyamdze kɛse: hom mma wonhu yi wɔ asaase nyina."

column3: ɔwo a etse Zion: osiandɛ Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi a ɔtse wo mu no yɛ kɛse."
